alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:49PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hampshire, Franklin and northwestern Hampden Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 848 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montgomery, or near Westfield, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rain with localized minor flooding, winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Greenfield, Deerfield, Easthampton, Monroe, Montague, Southampton, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Northfield, Williamsburg, Huntington, Bernardston, Buckland, Conway and Shelburne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
